subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Michael Rogers of Australia won Tuesday’s stage, a 147-mile ride into the Pyrenees, but the podium hopes of the American Tejay van Garderen were dealt a serious blow.
snippet: Michael Rogers of Australia won Tuesday’s stage, a 147-mile ride into the Pyrenees, but the podium hopes of the American Tejay van Garderen were dealt a serious blow.
